isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - HOOD SEAL

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Seal on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700 and 8500 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 25 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check hood seal (Item 1) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace it.

Position hood seal (Item 1) with hood seal mounting groove over the flange of the cowl tray (Item 2). Push hood seal down firmly onto cowl tray flange all the way across the cowl tray to secure it properly.
Close hood and fasten latches on both sides of hood.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Seal on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 26 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check hood seals (Items 1 and 3) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace them.

Position hood seal (Item 1) with hood seal mounting groove over the flange of the cowl tray (Item 2). Push hood seal down firmly onto cowl tray flange all the way across the cowl tray to secure it properly.
Position short hood seal (Item 3) with hood seal mounting groove over the flange of the cowl tray (Item 2). Push short hood seal down firmly onto cowl tray to secure it properly.
Close hood and fasten latches on both sides of hood.
